explains: adj. 多次重复的，频繁的；持续的，不间断的

sentences.en: They felt continual pressure to perform well.
sentences.cn: 他们感受到持续不断的、要表演得好的压力。

sentences.en: She finds the continual confrontation very wearing.
sentences.cn: 她发现持续的对峙使人精疲力竭。

sentences.en: Life was a continual struggle for them.
sentences.cn: 生活对他们来说就是不断的挣扎。
